mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_XUSERS(userid, rnum, passwd1, passwd2, custnm, pernm, useyn, password, role, custcd, spjangcd, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone, dbnm, encodepw, wrongnum) VALUES (#{userid},#{rnum}, #{passwd1}, #{passwd2}, #{custnm}, #{pernm}, #{useyn}, #{password}, #{role}, #{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{username}, #{actcd}, #{actnm}, #{saupnum}, #{flag}, #{phone}, #{dbnm}, #{encodepw}, 0)
mapper.select: select custcd, custnm from tb_xusers where len(custnm) > 0 group by custcd, custnm

select top 1 userid, passwd1, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone, perid, pernm, useyn, role, dbnm, wrongnum, custcd, custnm, perid, pushid, rnum from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and passwd1=#{passwd1}

select top 1 userid, passwd1, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone, perid, pernm, useyn, role, dbnm, wrongnum, custcd, custnm, perid, pushid, rnum from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and passwd1=#{passwd1} and flag=#{flag}

select top 1 userid, passwd1, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone, perid, pernm, useyn, role, dbnm, wrongnum, custcd, custnm, dbnm, pushid, rnum from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and passwd1=#{passwd1} and flag = #{flag}

select top 1 seq, userid, passwd1, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone, perid, pernm, useyn, role, dbnm, wrongnum, custcd, custnm, pushid, rnum from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and flag = #{flag}

select top 1 seq, userid, passwd1, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone, perid, pernm, useyn, role, dbnm, wrongnum, custcd, custnm, pushid, rnum from TB_XUSERS where pernm=#{pernm} and flag = #{flag}

select top 1 seq, userid, passwd1, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone, perid, pernm, useyn, role, dbnm, wrongnum, custcd, custnm, pushid, rnum from TB_XUSERS where saupnum=#{saupnum} and flag = #{flag}

select seq, userid, passwd1, username, actcd, actnm, rnum, phone, perid, pernm, useyn, role, dbnm, wrongnum, custcd, custnm, case useyn when 'Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '미사용' END as flag from TB_XUSERS where flag like CONCAT('%',#{flag},'%') and flag in ('AA', 'BB','CC', 'DD') AND (username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%') or userid like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%') ) and len(username) > 0 order by flag, username
select idx, menudv, menuid, msysname, mname, mtext, mlevel, msort from TB_XMENU

select A.menudv as menudv, A.menuid as menuid, A.userid as userid, A.msysname as msysname, A.mname as mname, A.mtext as mtext, A.mlevel as mlevel, A.msort as msort, B.username as username, case visible when 'Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '미사용' END as visible from TB_XUSERMENU A with (NOLOCK) , TB_XUSERS B with (NOLOCK) where A.userid = B.userid and A.userid=#{userid}

select DISTINCT userid, ipaddr, Left(onoffdt,4) + '-' + substring(onoffdt, 5,2) + '-' + substring(onoffdt, 7,2) AS onoffdt, usernm, ondate, ofdate, onoffdv from ( select userid, ipaddr, onoffdt, usernm, ondate, case onoffdv when 'Y' then 'IN' ELSE 'OFF' END AS onoffdv, ofdate from TB_XLOGIN where userid like CONCAT('%', #{userid}, '%') AND ofdate IS NULL union select userid, ipaddr, onoffdt, usernm, ofdate as ondate, case onoffdv when 'Y' then 'IN' ELSE 'OFF' END AS onoffdv, ofdate from TB_XLOGIN where userid like CONCAT('%', #{userid}, '%') AND ondate IS NULL ) F order by onoffdt desc, usernm, ondate
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_XUSERS SET userid=#{userid}, username=#{username}, passwd1=#{passwd1}, passwd2=#{passwd1}, useyn=#{useyn}, custnm=#{username}, pernm=#{username} where seq=#{seq} and flag = #{flag}
UPDATE TB_XUSERS SET userid=#{userid}, username=#{username}, passwd1=#{passwd1}, passwd2=#{passwd1}, useyn=#{useyn}, custnm=#{custnm}, role=#{role}, rnum=#{rnum} where seq=#{seq} and flag = #{flag}

UPDATE TB_XUSERS SET perid = #{perid}, userid=#{userid}, username=#{username}, passwd1=#{passwd1}, passwd2=#{passwd1}, custnm=#{custnm}, saupnum=#{saupnum}, rnum='0', USEYN=#{useyn} where seq=#{seq} and flag = #{flag}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_XUSERS (userid, passwd1, passwd2, custnm, pernm, rnum, username, flag, wrongnum, USEYN , perid, password, role, custcd, spjangcd, saupnum, phone, encodepw) VALUES (#{userid}, #{passwd1}, #{passwd2}, #{custnm}, #{username}, #{rnum}, #{username}, #{flag}, 0, 'Y', #{perid}, #{passwd1}, #{role}, #{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{saupnum}, #{phone}, '$2a$10$GeEZZkFfKQdC.YMvVgvBduyV9DVvucitE9lv97BTjHRem68K29zmum')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_XUSERMENU SET visible=#{visible} where userid=#{userid} and menuid = #{menuid}
mapper.select: SELECT dbo.uf_client_info(#{saupnum})
SELECT dbo.uf_clientnm_info(#{actcd})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_XUSERS SET dbnm=#{dbnm}, cltcd=#{cltcd} from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and passwd1=#{passwd1}
mapper.select: SELECT dbo.uf_clientnm_info(#{saupnum}) as cltcd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_XLOGIN (userid, ipaddr, onoffdt, custnm, usernm, ondate, onoffdv) VALUES (#{userid}, #{ipaddr}, convert(varchar(8),getDate(),112), #{custnm}, #{username}, getDate(), 'Y')
INSERT INTO TB_XLOGIN (userid, ipaddr, onoffdt, custnm, usernm, ofdate, onoffdv) VALUES (#{userid}, #{ipaddr}, convert(varchar(8),getDate(),112), #{custnm}, #{username}, getDate(), 'N')
mapper.select: select top(1) dbnm from tb_xusers where saupnum=#{saupnum}
select top(1) pushid from tb_xusers where pernm=#{pernm} and dbnm =#{dbnm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log (type, menunm, source, message, userid, usernm, _created) VALUES (#{type}, #{menunm}, #{source}, #{message}, #{userid},#{usernm}, getDate() )
mapper.select: select type from sys_log group by type
select menunm from sys_log group by menunm
select isnull( usernm , '') as usernm from sys_log WHERE LEN(isnull( usernm , '')) > 0 group by usernm order by usernm

select id, type, menunm, source, message, userid, usernm, _created from sys_log where CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), _created, 112) between #{frdate} and #{todate} AND type Like concat('%',#{type},'%') AND usernm Like concat('%',#{usernm},'%') AND message Like concat('%',#{message},'%') AND menunm Like concat('%',#{menunm},'%')
